Summary: Multiple witnesses from different counties reported high levels of activity north, n/w of Columbus
trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Columbus
There was one other sighting in Columbus on or around October 11th 2013
divs: sighting detailswsyx (local channel 6) received numerous calls about this incident last night around 9 to 10pm. my personal observation was n\w of my house. a solid white light moving left to right rapidly. back and forth for about 3 minutes. interesting that the light kept the same distance from left to right each time. it never traveled further to either side. the light then descended behind a tree line. reappeared briefly above the treeline then vanished. some people reported the light changing colors. mine was a solid white light. please investigate this as it had many, many people startled across several different locations.
